Full Description: Write a program that performs addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division using switch or if-else.
Write a program to calculate area of triangle using formula (0.5 * base * height).
Write a program to calculate simple interest i = (p*r*n)/100.
Write a program to interchange two numbers using temp variable, arithmetic, or pointers.
Convert distance in km to meters, feet, inches, and centimeters.
Compute Fahrenheit from Centigrade using f = 1.8*c + 32.
Find if a number is positive, negative, or zero.
Read marks and check if student passed (>=40) or failed.
Read three numbers and find maximum using nested if else.
Check whether entered character is capital, small, digit or special.
Read marks and display grade (Distinction, First, Second, Fail).
Prepare pay slip using DA,HRA,MA,PF, Gross, Net calculations.
Read number 1-7 and print corresponding day using switch-case.
Find maximum and minimum from given 10 numbers.
Find factorial of given number using iteration.
Reverse digits of number using %10 method.
Generate first n Fibonacci numbers.
Calculate average and total of 5 students for 3 subjects.
Count no. of persons with height >170 and weight <50.
Check whether number is prime or not.
Evaluate series 1^2+2^2+...+n^2.
Compute series 1+1/2!+1/3!+...+1/n!.
Print star pyramid and inverted star patterns.
Print number-based patterns (ascending, descending).
Print alphabet-based pyramid patterns.
Read and store roll no and marks of 20 students.
Find maximum element from 1-D array.
Sort array in ascending order (bubble/selection sort).
Replace a character in given string.
Reverse a string.
Convert string into uppercase.
Define function to add first n numbers.
Function returns 1 if prime, else 0.
Find factorial using recursion.
Convert lowercase chars in string to uppercase.
Read structure elements from keyboard.
Define struct personal with name, joining date, salary for 5 people.
Define struct time_struct {hour, minute, second} and display formatted time.
Define struct student_record {name, branch, total_marks} for 10 students.
Print address of a variable using pointer.
Swap two values using pointers.
Print address and value of string characters using pointer.
Access array elements with pointers.
Read, print and add matrices using pointers and functions.
Sort array using pointers.
Store n numbers in file, separate even/odd into Even.txt & Odd.txt.
Accept lines from user, store in file, then print contents.
Read text file, count characters per line and total lines.
Merge two files into third file.
Delete spaces from file and write into new file.
